options.name: Arcane Mana
options.description: You've learned to tap into pure magical essence, gaining 3 'Mana Points' which can each be used to channel a spell that you know without requiring energy.

options.name: Theoretical Mastery
options.description: Your mind processes magical formulae with machine-like precision. Gain +1 skill with logic. You can continue a ritual that you prematurely ended as long as you restart within 6 hours of ending it without a penalty.

options.name: Scribe
options.description: Ancient runes and mystical symbols flow from your quill like water. Gain +1 skill with glyphcraft and become fluent in one magical language.

options.name: Action : Mana Burn
options.description: You channel 1 or more remaining mana you have available at a creature within a short (10 unit) distance. Roll a concentration dice for each Mana Point you have as an attack check against your target's resilience check. For each success, you deal 6 aetheric damage. Critical dice deal 10 aetheric damage instead.

options.name: Researcher
options.description: Your spell research is unparalleled. Gain +1 skill with magic. Once per day, when researching a spell, you do not suffer the penalty for not knowing it.

options.name: Structured Mind
options.description: A wizard's mind must be sharp to keep a large selection of spells. Gain +1 skill with concentration. You never truly forget spells; instead you can switch out spells that you know with any spell that you knew in the past at the end of a full rest.

options.name: Master of Schools
options.description: Your mastery extends across multiple schools of magic. Gain +1 skill with primal magic and +1 skill with meta magic.

options.name: Arcane Scholar
options.description: Your dedication to magical study is unmatched. Gain +1 skill with academics and +3 spell capacity.

options.name: Wizard's Meditation
options.description: You spend an uninterrupted hour meditating where you cannot move or make any skill checks. Roll a concentration check; for each dice that is 10 or higher, restore a mana point. On any critical dice, you can also restore a fizzled spell.

options.name: Archmage
options.description: You gain 2 additional Mana Points. Using a Mana Point to channel a spell grants you a bonus dice on the spell check.
